title: [SOLVED]820-2915 line on boot screen
message: The computer boots but at the apple logo a line appears and then it shuts down. Can it be fixed?

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 line on boot screen
message: The crap is normal, but the shut down is not. Boot from a good USB HDD and see if it does not shut down. Else take it to Apple for a free fix for the GPU recall.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 line on boot screen
message:
Tried different hard drives with same result. Even tried too both from usb stick, still the same.
After the line appears screen goes black for about 3 sec then just white for 15 sec then black 3 sec then white with apple logo again. this keep looping.
Same with external screen.

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 line on boot screen
message: Time to take this thing to apple....;);)

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 line on boot screen
message: ok, I have 10 days left to do that!!!!

title: [SOLVED]820-2915 line on boot screen
message: When I check coverage on the apple support page it tells me that I have to validate the purchase date. I bought it second hand and have no recite.
